address_1_comparable_1: House on Plot No. 160/Part & 161 (As per documents)
address_2_comparable_1: House on Plot No. 161 (As per site)
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
base_value_type: Built Up Area as on Date of Valuation
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located on Plot No. 161, Shankar Green Homes, Ameenpur Village, Medak District. 
• As per the sale deed and gram panchayat plan, the land area is 1,656 sft and built-up area is 1,224 sft. 
• The property is self-occupied and is in good condition both externally and internally. 
• The valuation is based on the comparable sale deed of the same property type in the same area. The 'land and building' method has been adopted. 
• The amenities include modular kitchen and covered car park. 
• All permitted setbacks are maintained as per the gram panchayat plan. 
• No unit or vertical deviations observed. 
• The property is not within a protected or regulated area. 
• The expected future physical life of the property is 52 years. 
• It is assumed that the property has clear title and all necessary approvals and permissions have been duly obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 15 March 2024 is INR 1,776,800/- [One Million Seven Hundred Seventy-Six Thousand Eight Hundred Rupees] and the value of amenities as on 15 March 2024 is INR NA/- [Not Available] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
